In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come, he said in the statement. Google's other co-founder Sergey Brin will oversee strategic projects, specifically new products. Editor, CIO Tarun Pandey, Vice President-IT, Aditya Birla Financial Services
